net.bubbaland.trivia.client

Class TriviaClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bubbaland.trivia.client.TriviaClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class TriviaClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.WindowListener
    Provides the root functionality for connecting to the trivia server and creating the associated GUI.
    Author:
    Walter Kolczynski

    • Method Detail

      • disconnected

        public void disconnected()
        Display disconnected dialog box and prompt for action

      • getTrivia

        public Trivia getTrivia()
        Return the local Trivia object. When updating the GUI, always get the current Trivia object first to ensure the most recent data is used. Components should always use this local version to read data to limit server traffic.
        Returns:
        The local Trivia object

      • getUser

        public java.lang.String getUser()
        Gets the user name.
        Returns:
        The user name

        The hashtable of users and roles

      • windowClosing

        public void windowClosing(java.awt.event.WindowEvent e)
        When one of the windows tries to close, save the properties and position of the window first. Then exit the program if there are no open windows left.
        Specified by:
        windowClosing in interface java.awt.event.WindowListener

      • getServer

        public TriviaInterface getServer()
        Get the remote server handle to allow interaction with the server.
        Returns:
        The remote server handle

      • registerWindow

        public void registerWindow(TriviaFrame frame)
        Register a window as a child of the client. New Trivia Frames do this so the client can track events from them.
        Parameters:
        frame - The window to track

      • unregisterWindow

        public void unregisterWindow(TriviaFrame frame)
        Unregister a window as a child of the client. This is done when a window closes.
        Parameters:
        frame - The window to stop tracking

      • getNTriviaWindows

        public int getNTriviaWindows()
        Get the number of registered windows.
        Returns:
        The number of windows

      • getTab

        public TriviaMainPanel getTab(TriviaFrame frame,
                     java.lang.String tabName)
        Create a panel to add as a tab to a tabbed pane.
        Parameters:

        tabName - The tab name to create
        Returns:
        The panel to add as a tab

      • loadPosition

        public static void loadPosition(java.awt.Window window)
        Load the saved position and size of the window from file. If none found, use preferred size of components.
        Parameters:
        window - The window whose position and size is to be loaded

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Entry point for the client application. Only the first argument is used. If the first argument is "useFX", the client will include an IRC client panel.
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments; only "useFX" is recognized as an argument

      • ordinalize

        public static java.lang.String ordinalize(int cardinal)
        Convert a cardinal number into its ordinal counterpart.
        Parameters:
        cardinal - The number to convert to ordinal form
        Returns:
        String with the ordinal representation of the number (e.g., 1st, 2nd, 3rd, etc.)

      • savePosition

        public static void savePosition(java.awt.Window window)
        Save the position and size of the window to file.
        Parameters:
        window - The window whose size and position is to be saved

      • loadDefaults

        public static void loadDefaults()
        Clear all saved data from file.

        Ask all child windows to reload the properties.

        public void resetProperties()
        Reset properties to defaults, then ask all child windows to load the new properties.
